## Type of Change

<!-- Mark relevant items with an 'x' -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Security improvement
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Test addition/improvement

## Security Checklist

<!-- Required for all PRs. Mark with 'x' or 'N/A' -->

- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or secrets
- [ ] User inputs are validated
- [ ] Error messages don't leak sensitive information
- [ ] Security logging is in place (if applicable)
- [ ] OWASP guidelines followed
- [ ] No new security warnings introduced
- [ ] Complies with security policy (SECURITY.md)

## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] Code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] Self-review of code performed
- [ ] Code is well-commented, especially complex logic
- [ ] XML documentation added for public APIs
- [ ] No compiler warnings introduced
- [ ] Nullable reference types handled correctly
- [ ] SOLID principles followed

## Documentation

- [ ] README.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] SECURITY.md updated (if security-related)
- [ ] PRIVACY.md updated (if privacy-related)
- [ ] Code comments added/updated
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (will be done by maintainer)

## Reviewer Notes

<!-- @maintainers: Notes for reviewers -->

---

**Before submitting:**
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] All security checks pass
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
